overview: The girls wear matching white shirts and thongs as they make use of a bottle of oil to get their party started. Soon their shirts and thongs are transparent, revealing a tantalizing hint of nips, engorged clits and wet pussy lips begging for attention.  It's movie night and the girls settle on the couch. It's not long before Tiffany begins tossing popcorn at Rebecca, who indulges her girlfriend with a smile. When Tiffany leans in to nibble the popcorn off Rebecca's belly, things of course take a sensual turn.
title: I Kissed a Girl 3
